name: quizzing
description: easy to build and share trivia boards
author: Doug Goldstein <ddgold@me.com>

scripts.dev: docker-compose up -d mongo redis && concurrently -n "server, web  ," -c "bgGreen,bgBlue"  "yarn workspace @quizzing/server dev" "yarn workspace @quizzing/web dev" && docker-compose stop mongo redis
